results.title: VC Roundup: Crypto funding rebounds as institutions test onchain finance
results.description: From venture rounds to onchain credit, capital is moving cautiously back into crypto as institutions focus on infrastructure and real-world use cases.

results.title: Bitcoin vs. gold: BTC is a 'better opportunity' than in 2017, data says
results.description: Bitcoin could start catching up to gold as soon as February, as traders anticipate BTC to recover from its record lows versus gold this year.

results.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
results.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

results.title: Active Solana addresses spike 115%, four in 10 merchants take Bitcoin: Month in Charts
results.description: Activity on Solana has spiked as new AI tech makes it easier than ever to launch memecoins. Meanwhile, Ethereum is plugging away at future-proofing and bringing down fees.

results.title: US Treasury sanctions Iran-linked crypto exchanges for first time
results.description: The US Treasury has sanctioned two UK-registered crypto exchanges tied to Iran’s financial system, marking the first time Washington has targeted digital asset platforms.

results.title: Crypto billionaires deploy $40M to fight California wealth tax and union power
results.description: Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen and venture capitalist Tim Draper are backing Grow California, a new political effort aimed at countering union-backed wealth tax proposals.

results.title: $1.82B pulled from spot Bitcoin and Ether ETFs amid metals rally
results.description: ETF analyst Eric Balchunas said many people seem to be forgetting that Bitcoin “spanked everything so bad” in 2023 and 2024, while other asset classes “still haven’t caught up.”

results.title: Coinbase insider trading lawsuit against Armstrong, directors moves forward
results.description: The lawsuit alleges Marc Andreessen sold $118.7 million in Coinbase shares through Andreessen Horowitz, while CEO Brian Armstrong offloaded about $291.8 million.

results.title: Lingering extreme fear in crypto is a 'strong bullish' sign: Santiment
results.description: Crypto sentiment platform Santiment said the “silver lining” in the current crypto market is the “extreme negativity” seen on social media.

results.title: Tether US treasury holdings reach record highs; profits fall 23% year-on-year
results.description: Tether CEO Paolo Ardoino said the “structure behind” the company’s growth mattered more than its “scale” in 2025, as US Treasury holdings surpassed $122 billion.

results.title: Bitcoin Mining Profits Hit 14-Month Low After Winter Storm Rocks Miners: CryptoQuant
results.description: Bitcoin miners are "extremely underpaid" given the price of Bitcoin and current BTC mining conditions, according to a CryptoQuant report.

results.title: Plan B Network Launches CypherTank, a Bitcoin Pitch Series Showcasing Builders and Ideas
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Plan B Network Launches CypherTank, a Bitcoin Pitch Series Showcasing Builders and Ideas Plan B Network has launched CypherTank, a global Bitcoin-focused pitch series that spotlights builders, ideas, and community discussion across multiple platforms. results.title: Tennessee Lawmakers To Weigh Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Tennessee Lawmakers To Weigh Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill Tennessee lawmakers are considering a bill that would allow the state to invest up to 10% of certain public funds in bitcoin. This post Tennessee Lawmakers To Weigh Strategic Bitcoin Reserve Bill first appeared on Bitcoin Magazine and is written by Micah Zimmerman.

results.title: Gold Is the Real Bubble, Says Ark Invest's Cathie Wood—Not AI
results.description: Tech investor Cathie Wood isn't worried about an AI bubble, instead singling out gold as the real ongoing asset bubble.

results.title: Experts Warn Data Center Backlash Could Slow AI Infrastructure Growth
results.description: A new Brookings report says binding community benefit agreements are increasingly necessary as local opposition mounts over AI data centers.

results.title: Bitcoin Price Holds Steady as Gold Falls and Silver Craters
results.description: Bitcoin stays resilient while gold and silver see historic crashes amid Fed chair nomination fears and shifting rate expectations.

results.title: AI Agents Launched a Social Network and Spawned a Digital Religion Overnight
results.description: Autonomous agents on an AI-centric social network spontaneously founded "Crustafarianism"—complete with scripture, prophets, and theology.

results.title: Blank Check Firm Linked to Crypto Exchange Kraken Raises $345 Million in Upsized IPO
results.description: A new special purpose acquisition vehicle (SPAC) tied to crypto exchange Kraken completed its IPO, raising $345 million.

results.title: Vitalik Buterin Withdraws $44.7M in ETH to Support Ethereum Growth Through ‘Mild Austerity’
results.description: The Ethereum co-founder wants to pursue an “aggressive” roadmap that will strengthen its status as a decentralized world computer.

results.title: What Trump’s Fed Pick Kevin Warsh Means for Crypto
results.description: U.S. President Donald Trump has nominated Kevin Warsh to replace Jerome Powell, elevating a former Fed governor with mixed views on crypto.

results.title: Bitcoin Traders See Nearly Even Odds for $69K Drop or $100K Recovery
results.description: Bitcoin sentiment on Myriad flipped bearish for first time in two months as traders bet on further downside amid shutdown fears and extreme market volatility.

results.title: Binance to Move $1 Billion User Protection Fund Into Bitcoin
results.description: Bitcoin Magazine Binance to Move $1 Billion User Protection Fund Into Bitcoin As the bitcoin price slumps, Binance said it will convert the $1 billion stablecoin-backed Secure Asset Fund for Users entirely into bitcoin over the next 30 days.
